properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , NVL(REPLY_NO, '-') REPLY_NO , REPORTING_MEM , MEM_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG FROM REPORTED JOIN MEM_INFO ON (REPORTED_MEM = MEM_NO) ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , REPLY_NO , REPORTING_MEM , MEM_ID , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_CTG FROM REPORTED JOIN MEM_INFO ON (REPORTED_MEM = MEM_NO) WHERE TYPE_BR = ? AND REPORT_DATE BETWEEN ? AND SYSDATE AND MEM_ID LIKE ? AND REPORT_STATUS = ?
UPDATE REPORTED SET REPORT_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
SELECT REPORT_NO , CONTENT_NO , REPLY_NO , REPORTING_MEM , REPORTED_MEM , REPORT_CONTENT , REPORT_DATE , REPORT_STATUS , REPORT_CTG , TYPE_BR FROM REPORTED WHERE REPORT_NO = ?
